name: MHR FOUNDATION OF INDIA
briefDescription: MHR Foundation of India supports and guides for Zero Budget Natural Farming (ZBNF) with help of famous trainer Mr. Subhash Palekar. He suggested cow dung of our local cow is effective. The cow dung should be used as fresh as possible. It is more effective and one cow is needed for thirty acres of land. For one acre one dayâ€™s cow dung is enough. That means thirty days cow dung for thirty acres. The four foundation of Zero Budget Spiritual Farming are Bijamitra, Jiwamitra, Mulching and Waapasha
